urls.title: What should i do if my baggage was delayed?
urls.description: What should i do if my baggage was delayed? If your checked bag is missing, you may lodge a report online via Malaysia Airlines’ Self-Service Portal HERE. You must report your delayed baggage within 24 hours upon arrival at the airport. You may also contact our Baggage Offices team at your respective arrival destination HERE. For more information, please click HERE. Can't find the answer you are looking for? Ask us through one of the channels
